body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0008]/value as T0_mental_status,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0009]/value as T0_physical_activity,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0010]/value as T0_mobility,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0011]/value as T0_food_intake,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0012]/value as T0_fluid_intake,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0013]/value as T0_incontinence,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0014]/value as T0_general_condition,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0057]/value as T0_mns_score,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/items[at0058]/value as T0_mns_interpretation
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.nursing_support_pressure_ulcer.v0]
  )
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
